price: Gyesε wͻn a wͻ’sakra wͻn adwen na wͻ’toto ntotoeε pa, na wͻ’da (Nsεm no) adi (kyerε amanfoͻ), saa nkorͻfoͻ no deε Metie wͻn adwen sakra no (efrisε) Me na Metie obi a ͻsakra n’adwen no adwen sakra, (na Mene) Mmͻborͻhunufoͻ Hene no.
arabic: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ تَابُواْ وَأَصۡلَحُواْ وَبَيَّنُواْ فَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ أَتُوبُ عَلَيۡهِمۡ وَأَنَا ٱلتَّوَّابُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: illā alladhīna tābū wa-aṣlaḥū wabayyanū fa-ulāika atūbu ʿalayhim wa-anā al-tawābu al-raḥīmu
